name: From Heck To Back
description:
A project that was originally made for the GameJam "VimJam". Was too late to submit but will still publish due to the fact that the project is complete and might as well still share it regardless. 

You play as an Evil Wizard, trying to get four crystals to revive the dead lord. Fight through enemies and collect the four crystals to bring about the revival of the forgotten lord.

Controls:

A, Left Arrow Key - Move Left

D , Right Arrow Key - Move Right

S, Up Arrow Key, Space - Jump

Z, Left Mouse Button - Attack01

X, Right Mouse Button - Attack02

Assets Used:

Evil Wizard 2 and Monsters Creatures Fantasty by LuizMelo

Spooky Dungeon Music by Memoraphile @ You're Perfect Studio

8bitBattleLoop Music by Wolfgang

Jump, Hurt, EnemyDestroyed, Pickup_Crystal and PortalSpawn Sounds were made with bfxr

Portals made by RodHakGames - RHG

CrystalSpriteSheet by One To Zero

Gothicvania Church Environment Art (used both in-game and page background) by ansimuz

Kenny Rocket Font by Kenny

Steps for installing:

1. Download the .zip file from the page

2. Extract the .exe and .pck files (both are needed to run the game. I advise creating a folder to keep the two organized).

3. Click on the .exe and you should be able to play it! Enjoy!
